body_html: Tensorflow Ruby API is very important for a large number of people from around the world (for example I'm from Russia), so maybe a good option would be to start a sort of open-raise funds for participants GSoC who wanted to undertake the development of this project, but so that the source was discovered during development, so that everyone can make a contribution. (sorry for my bad English)

body: **Tensorflow Ruby API** is very important for a large number of people from around the world (for example I'm from Russia), so maybe a good option would be to start a sort of open-raise funds for participants GSoC who wanted to undertake the development of this project, but so that the source was discovered during development, so that everyone can make a contribution. (sorry for my bad English)
